attributes.review: It’s too slow, won’t load and keeps asking for information. The person who runs this app seems to be inappropriate too
attributes.title: Slow, too many bugs

attributes.review: First off, it took 12 hours to download and I had to delete every single picture and app off my phone cause there was no room. Second of all, this app supports a fascist who wants to turn America into a dictatorship.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: UGHHH!!!! I was sooo excited to support my big Cheeto this year when I was reading all of the LOVELY reviews I understood this app was the one for me. I was ready to enjoy the app I saw it has a freaking AGE LIMIT on it. Probably cause he is using this app as a secret dating app ✨💜🧚🏻‍♂️. Anyways don’t get it xoxo- jake  🎣 🦃🏉
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: So I downloaded and it seriously took all my data and started sending me weird stuff and then in was like forcing me to vote for him and stuff. And it send me a text that said “your data is now in a safe place with trump”. BOY I DONT WANT MY SUFF WITH TRUMP!!!!!!!!!!!!! Just DO NOT get this app!!
attributes.title: Omg this app is just HORRIBLE!!!!!!!! I HATE IT!!!!!

attributes.review: It took several hours to download to my phone which is just awful. Why does it need that much time?? Anyways when it finally downloaded I clicked on it and it kept kicking me out!! Don’t download this it’s not worth it!
attributes.title: AWFUL DONT DOWNLOAD!!

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support my favorite president and when i downloaded it my phone powered off and reset itself so now i have to get a new phone and i lost all my contacts and photos but still 🇺🇸Trump 2020🇺🇸
attributes.title: Broken

attributes.review: Honestly like it’s just the worst app i’ve ever downloaded. i mean the reviews don’t lie. don’t waste your time, energy, and phone space on this useless app. plus it steals your information!!
attributes.title: if i could give this zero stars i would

attributes.review: Donald trump was the worst app ever, it’s hard to use and it’s useless  don’t get the app if you’re not willing to spend hours trying to use it, my poor grandmother tried to use it and her phone ended up getting a virus! Unbelievable
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: The app took forever to download and it was very slow after it actually downloaded. It would kick me out of the app a couple times before I could actually get into it. Don’t recommend!
attributes.title: AWFUL!!

attributes.review: This app took about 8 hours to download, and it is so poorly laid out. On top of that, it doesn’t admit anywhere that Jeffrey Epstein didn’t kill himself, promotes rampant racist, sexist, homophobic, and xenophobic ideals. I can’t believe Apple even allows such a disgusting app to exist on their platform. Horrible.
attributes.title: Worst App Ever
